original_title: GOP nominee Curtis Sliwa sees pathway to victory in crowded NYC mayoral race field | Fox News
article_summary: Republican NYC mayoral nominee Curtis Sliwa urges President Trump to remain neutral in the race against Democratic nominee Zohran Mamdani, Cuomo, and Adams, comparing the latter two to Mamdani as "Zohran light" due to their similar views. Sliwa, a former Guardian Angels co-founder, emphasizes his unique position as the only Republican candidate in the race. Mamdani, a democratic socialist, currently holds a significant lead in polls for the general election in November.</s>
